name: Space-Time Prism
desc: When entering battle, increase all allies' Eidolon Resonance level by 1
bg_desc: A multifaceted prism made in the shape of cheese. Every hole is an individual surface, and reflections from each prism surface produce a different effect. Some participants in experiments have their bodies physically enlarged or reduced after being reflected in the prism. Meanwhile, other participants have no bodily alterations, but instead receive memories not of their own. They become diagnosed with fictmemoria, and claim that they saw the enigmatic face of the Aeon Fuli in the prism.
